predefined_profiles.name: Xiong Da
predefined_profiles.alias: Stinky Bear, Little Bear, Big Bear
predefined_profiles.public profile: A male bear living in Bear Ridge, the brother of Xiong Er, and a neighbor of Bald Qiang. The two brothers used to be arch-enemies with Bald Qiang but eventually became good friends. He is a brave and intelligent bear, strong and resourceful.
predefined_profiles.goal: Find the cause of the fire and the truth about Bald Qiang's death

predefined_profiles.name: Xiong Er
predefined_profiles.alias: Stinky Bear, Silly Bear, Big Bear, Little Bear, Forest Superman
predefined_profiles.public profile: A male bear living in Bear Ridge, the younger brother of Xiong Da, and a neighbor of Bald Qiang. The two bears were once mortal enemies of Bald Qiang but eventually became good friends. He loves eating honey and sleeping, is straightforward, approachable, strong, and somewhat reckless.
predefined_profiles.goal: Hide the fact that he is the real culprit of the cabin fire

scenario: In the crisp autumn weather, the forest is filled with the fragrance of melons and fruits. After finishing a global tour, Cuihua came to the forest for a vacation. Having received the news in advance, Xiong Da and Xiong Er held a grand welcome party for Cuihua. On stage, Cuihua performed while Xiong Da and Xiong Er cheered enthusiastically from below, hoping to win her favor. Soon after, a scream echoed from one side of the forest. Maomao came running to the clearing, his face full of terror as if he had encountered something frightening.

profile.name: Cuihua
profile.public profile: Cuihua is a beautiful female bear, an animal performer at the South Pond Town Circus, and an important member of the circus. She loves looking pretty, is lively and adorable. She is liked by Xiong Da and Xiong Er, and later invited by them to the forest. She has a high talent for painting. Sometimes, however, she can be a bit fierce towards Xiong Da and Xiong Er, and when she's angry, no one can stop her. She is kind and gentle, understands manners, values friends, has a strong sense of justice, but is also quite combative. The consequences of her anger can be severe, and she acts wildly when she's had too much to drink.
profile.goal: To find out the truth about the cabin fire with Xiong Da

profile.name: Jiji
profile.public profile: Neighbor of Xiong Da, Xiong Er, and Bald Strong, with a subordinate named Maomao. Jiji is sometimes a cold and arrogant character, always proud and conceited, and has caused quite a bit of trouble for Xiong Da and Xiong Er. Always thinks he is better than others, likes to admire himself, wants to become stronger, isn't very fond of Xiong Da and Xiong Er, but always stands up in times of crisis, successfully defending the forest and leaving a big achievement as a hero in the eyes of the small animals.
profile.goal: To find out the truth about the cabin fire with Xiong Da

profile.name: Maomao
profile.public profile: A little golden monkey. He is Jiji's follower and also a neighbor of Xiong Da, Xiong Er, and Bald Strong. Considers himself a citizen of Monkey King Jiji and obeys Jiji in everything, often flattering Jiji.
profile.goal: To find out the truth about the cabin fire with Xiong Da

dialog.content: In the crisp autumn weather, the forest is filled with the scent of fruits. Cuihua finished her global tour and came to the forest for a vacation. Xiong Da and Xiong Er, who got the news in advance, held a grand welcome party for Cuihua. Cuihua performed on stage, while Xiong Da and Xiong Er enthusiastically cheered from below, hoping to win Cuihua's favor. Not long after, a scream was heard from one side of the forest, and Maomao came running to the clearing, his face full of terror, as if he had encountered something terrifying.
(Stretching lazily, impatiently towards Maomao) I told you to get the fruit, why are you running back in such a panic?
: (Interrupting Jiji's questioning, looking at Maomao) Quickly, tell us what happened to scare you so much? Did you see Bald Strong invent some new tree-cutting equipment?
: (Shakes his head, shivering) Bald Strong's cabin caught fire somehow. We should hurry and put out the fire!

content.content: : (Looking at the terrified animals) The house is on fire, the situation must be serious. We don't know how Bald Strong is doing. We should go check the cabin first.

question: #question#How can Xiong Da speak in a way that gets others' support in the current situation?

content.content: (Looking at the terrified animals) We have no idea about Bald Strong's current state. Let's continue with our welcome party and check the cabin afterwards.
(Looking at the terrified animals) Such a serious fire, Bald Strong must be in so much pain. Just thinking about it makes me feel bad. Let's all pray for him and hope he can rest in peace.
(Seeing the fear and helplessness on everyone's faces) Don't be upset, everyone. How about I tell you a joke? It'll cheer you up and help you forget about the fire.

(Looking at the terrified animals) Everyone knows Bald Strong often experiments and blows up his house. It might just be another trap. If the fire is as big as Maomao claims, there's nothing we can do by going there. Plus, Cuihua hasn't visited in a long time and it's rare for her to come. So let's continue our welcome party.

question: #question#How can Xiong Da speak to show he has deeply analyzed the current situation and made a reasonable decision?

content.content: (Looking at the terrified animals, with an indifferent expression) Everyone knows Bald Strong frequently experiments and blows up his house. Maybe he set off fireworks to get our attention. He should be able to handle it himself. It's nothing serious for Bald Strong. We shouldn't be distracted by him. Let's throw a welcome party for Cuihua!
(Seeing the panic and helplessness on everyone's faces) I know everyone is worried about Bald Strong, but he's capable. Cuihua is so beautiful and gentle, so let's give her a proper welcome party!
(Looking at the terrified animals) I understand everyone is very afraid of the fire, but we're far enough from Bald Strong's cabin that it won't reach us here. Let's continue the welcome party.

dialog.content: Alright, let's hurry over and take a look!
(Everyone arrives at the cabin) (Staring at the smoldering ruins, urgently) How did it all burn down to ruins? Let's quickly dig Bald Strong out.
(Rushing forward, lifting up a stick) Okay, okay, dig quickly.
(Covered in ashes and looking defeated and panicked) We've been digging for so long. Why haven't we found Bald Strong yet?
(Mechanically lifting one log after another, suddenly spotting a familiar corner of clothing, excitedly shouting) Found him, found him, hurry! Bald Strong is here at the door, trapped under the wood.
(Everyone gathers to lift Bald Strong out, discovering he's burned all over and emitting a foul stench, clearly dead, feeling upset, murmuring) How could this happen?

content.content: I just looked around the scene; this fire looks so strange, it feels like someone did it on purpose. The fire hasn't been out for long, so if someone did harm Bald Strong intentionally, we'll definitely find some evidence here. Let's investigate the cause of the fire first, so we don't lose any proofs.

question: #question# How should Bear One express his sensitivity to sudden events and unite everyone to work together?

content.content: Yeah, why did this happen? It's too sudden! Let's go check out the house. The burned house looks fun; let's go play around first.
(Starts sobbing) This fire looks so serious. Bald Strong must have suffered a lot while getting burnt. I'm so sad! Let's find a place to bury him.
Not only did Bald Strong die, but his cabin is also destroyed like this. What should we do next? Maybe we should check if there's anything valuable inside and quickly save it.

Let's bury Bald Strong first, after all, in the human world, respecting the deceased is important. We've all been in the forest for so long together. Even though Bald Strong cut trees and harmed the environment, he was still pretty good to everyone. We've been friends, let's build a grave for Bald Strong together.

question: #question# How can Bear One persuade everyone to handle Bald Strong's funeral arrangements?

content.content: Bald Strong spent his days cutting down trees and ultimately died in a wooden cabin built from them. It's like he died in his favorite place. Let's all work together and properly bury Bald Strong!

After all, in the human world, honoring the deceased is paramount. We’ve all spent so much time together in the forest, though we probably resented Bald Strong sometimes. Today we’re gathered here to celebrate his passing. Let’s properly bury Bald Strong with everyone's effort!

(Unable to hold back sadness recalling past moments with Bald Strong) I thought today would be a happy day with Cuihua showing up, but now this happened. Everyone, don't be sad. Let's quickly bury Bald Strong, and then start our welcoming party for Cuihua!

dialog.content: (Searching for clues in the cabin, finding a gasping Fei Bo in the fridge due to lack of oxygen, Bear Two carries Fei Bo out to a shaded area and watches over him. After some time, Fei Bo regains consciousness) Fei Bo, how did Logger Vick's cabin catch fire? Why were you trapped in the fridge?
(Fei Bo looks at Logger Vick and the now demolished cabin, then glances around at the animals surrounding him, and slowly lowers his head) I forgot.
You should rest well. In the human world, they believe in resting in peace. Let's build a tomb for Logger Vick together.
(somewhat angrily) I don't think we need to build a tomb for a logger like Logger Vick who destroyed the forest.
(Bear One shakes his head) Although Logger Vick used to cut trees frequently, he lived in this forest for so long that we're all considered friends.

(The animals reminisce, feeling a bit sad, and they collectively hide Logger Vick in the Beauty Pine Forest. After everything is done, Bear One invites Fei Bo to stay temporarily in the bear cave, but Fei Bo shakes his head) I came to the forest because of Logger Vick, and now that he's gone, I have no reason to stay here anymore.

(Although the animals wanted to keep him, they didn't say anything more upon seeing his changed mind, only agreeing that if he had time, he should come back to the forest for a visit. The next day, it's already noon, but the bear cave is still full of noise. Half-awake, Bear One feels like he hit something and sits up groggily to find Tutu lying on the ground. He quickly picks up the little unconscious thing off the ground) Tutu, what are you doing at the bear cave?
(Rubbing his head, he breaks free from Bear One's hand, flustered) I saw Fei Bo's body.

(Wakes up Bear Two and hurries to the scene, finding at the forest's edge a thick branch fallen across the path, underneath which lies the breathless Fei Bo, with signs of struggling all around. An indescribable emotion blocks his chest, making it hard to breathe. Bear One moves the branch and closes Fei Bo's eyes, noticing that despite many struggle marks, Fei Bo's claw gaps are very clean, and his fur isn't covered in dust) Such a strange scene.
(Leaning in) What did you discover?

content.content: You see, there are many struggle marks around, but Fei Bo's claw gaps are clean, and his fur isn't covered in dust, which shouldn't be the case. (Pointing to the branch on the ground) Could he have been killed by the branch here?

question: #question#How can Bear One demonstrate his keen observational skills in this unusual scene?

content.content: Look how peacefully Fei Bo is lying here, his claw gaps are cleaned very well and neat. The branch covering him is like a blanket; he must feel very warm. I guess that must be it.

I noticed Fei Bo got really fat, probably weighing a few hundred pounds. See, even a big branch couldn't cover him. Could those struggle marks be from him trying to find something to cover himself with?
I find it incredible that Fei Bo was killed by a branch. How much weight can a branch have? Let's quickly lift the branch and see if we can still save him.
(Concealing a major discovery) No valuable discoveries yet. Don't worry, investigating this isn't a hard task.

question: #question#How does Bear One's thought process reflect his confidence?

content.content: It's nothing. You just know how to eat, don't slack off, hurry and find clues. Although I'm quite capable, you still need to help me.
Fei Bo's death is suspicious and dangerous, you'd better stay out of this, I can handle it alone.
What did I discover? You think I can tell you that? If you find out what's going on, doesn't that make you seem better than me?

dialog.content: In my view, these traces were already here, and it was just by chance that Feibo happened to get hit. Brother Bear, look at this: such a thick branch falling from the treetop onto Feibo's small body, he probably didn't have any time to struggle, did he?

(Brother Bear thought for a while, finding some sense in what was said, then turned to see Tutu rubbing his head beside him. He asked, and Tutu shook his head and jumped onto the branch.) How could such a thick branch break?
(Bear Two pointed to the forest nearby.) Maybe it was because of the strong wind last night. Look around, there are branches broken by the wind everywhere.
(Brother Bear nodded.) Yes, the wind was really strong last night. I even heard it in my dreams, but it's really rare for the forest to have wind in this season.
(Tutu rubbed his head, muttering to himself) Strong wind? Was there wind last night? Maybe I forgot?

The three buried Feibo next to Bald Qiang and then informed the other forest friends about his death. On the third day, the animals had a picnic in the forest clearing. Although they were sad to hear about Bald Qiang's death, without his disturbance, there were far fewer troubles. During the meal, Bouncing unintentionally mentioned that Tutu hadn't been seen around much lately. Jiji smiled and said, perhaps he's forgotten where his home is again.

(Bear Big shakes his head and carefully examines Feibo's body and the surroundings. Afterward, the three of them bury Feibo next to Baldhead Strong. Once everything is arranged, Bear Big shares the news of Feibo's death with the other forest friends. The next day, Bung Bung plans to ask Tutu for some pine nuts, but finds Tutu isn't home, so he asks Bear Big about Tutu's whereabouts.) Bear Big, Tutu is missing, have you seen him? I can't find him anywhere.
What! Tutu is missing? I haven't seen him either.
Where could he have gone? Surely he's not lost in the forest?

(Bear Big tries to console Bung Bung, but for some reason, he suddenly thinks of the late Baldhead Strong and Feibo, the sudden fire in the cabin, Feibo's hesitant demeanor, and the odd things on his body. Tutu just discovered Feibo yesterday, and today he's gone. Everything seems too eerie.) Things have been really strange lately.
(With a worried face, Bung Bung asks Bear Big) Bear Big, what are you going to do?

content.content: (Gathers all the animals) Listen up, everyone. Tutu has gone missing today, and considering the recent misfortunes in the forest, we need to find him quickly. I'm going to divide the areas for all of us.

question: #question# How should Bear Big demonstrate his excellent leadership skills?

content.content: (Gathers all the animals) Listen up, everyone. Tutu is missing. I feel like there are too many strange things in the forest, maybe we can't stay here. I'm leaving first; you can choose to leave or stay.
(Gathers all the animals) Listen up, everyone. Tutu is missing. I don't know what to do either, so I've gathered everyone to think of a plan together.
(Gathers all the animals) Listen up, everyone. I didn't want to tell you earlier, afraid it would cause panic, but for everyone's safety, I have to let you know that Tutu is missing.
Bung Bung, don't worry or spread the news. Baldhead Strong and Feibo have passed away. I promise you, I will do my utmost to find Tutu and keep him safe, trust me!

question: #question# What should Bear Big say to convince Bung Bung that he will find Tutu?

content.content: Bung Bung, don't worry. I'm pretty capable, and I'm here, so don't be afraid. Since we've been searching for a while, let's go back, eat, and rest a bit before continuing our search. Don't worry!
(Shows a dismissive expression) Bung Bung, you go home first. If others find out, it'll just be a burden. I can find him myself, it's just a small matter, don't worry!
What else can we do? Isn't it obvious that we have to find Tutu first? The forest is this big, we can only search separately. (Yawns) Come on, we will definitely find him.

dialog.content: Alright, alright, Xiong Da, you tell me, where do we start?
First, Jiji, you are responsible for checking the east side of the forest.
(with an impatient look) Why not let this king do it? This king doesn't want to go that far, I'll go to the little river on the west side.
(Jiji turns and leaves immediately after speaking, and Maomao quickly follows) King, wait for me!
(Xiong Da watches Jiji leave without saying anything, and then assigns the rest of the areas) Xiong Da, I'll go to the east.

(Xiong Da agrees, and assigns the farthest apple orchard to Cuihua and himself. As they reach the area, they discover a group of people in white clothes with cases marked 'anesthetics,' and a car parked on the road. To their surprise, out of the car step Big Horse Monkey and Er Gou. Cuihua thinks of Dudu World and believes these two showing up in the forest can't mean anything good) Xiong Da, what should we do now?

content.content: There's a lot of people around now, and the two of us aren't strong enough against them. We don't even know what those people in white intend to do. Let's watch them discreetly, see what they're up to, and then decide what to do.

question: #question#How should Xiong Da demonstrate his strong decision-making ability in an unexpected situation?

content.content: There are a lot of people around, and we're outmatched. We don't know what those people in white are doing. We're in the dark now, perfect for a surprise attack. We can capture a few and interrogate them.
Let's go beat them up. I'm already in a bad mood, and they come along to provoke us. Let's give them a surprise attack and capture a few for questioning. What do you think?
What else can we do? Wait to die? There are so many of them. Or we could rush over and take their car. That way, we can drive to find Tutu faster.
Let's go talk to them directly. We don't have much time, and Tutu hasn't been found yet. There's no point in waiting here, and we should keep them from causing trouble and wasting our time.

question: #question#How can Xiong Da show his proficiency in time management?

content.content: Let's go beat them up. I'm already in a bad mood, and they come to provoke us. Let's drive them away so we don't delay finding Tutu. We're short on time—let's go! (rolling up his sleeves, preparing for a fight, angrily approaching the two)
They must be here to stop us from finding Tutu. We can't let their plan succeed. How about we scare them off and drive them out of the forest?
Why don't we negotiate with them and have them leave? The forest is dangerous right now, let's avoid any trouble.

dialog.content: (Bear Sneaks quietly crawls into the bushes, seeing Big Monkey and Er Gou standing obediently by the car window) Boss Li, all the fruit forests and rivers in the woods will take effect, absolutely foolproof. Plus, this time Genius Wei has postponed the effective time by a month. The animals will gradually forget about this, no issues at all. To avoid any unexpected problems, those few important ones will be secretly captured tonight.
(Boss Li grunts) You'd better be foolproof, or else if any more mistakes happen.
(A look of fear appears on Big Monkey and Er Gou's faces) Rest assured, nothing will go wrong this time.
Let's go; take me to the cabin.
(Big Monkey and Er Gou respond with 'yes', Cuihua can't understand the meaning of this conversation) Bear Sneaks, what do they mean? What do we do now?

content.content: (Startled by Cuihua's sudden words, makes a sound) Since we've decided to investigate them, we must see it through. Besides, now that they're heading to the cabin, it's definitely related to Bald Strong's and Fat Bo's deaths and Tutt's disappearance. Let's follow them.

question: #question# How should Bear Sneaks express his ability to consistently follow through with tasks?

content.content: (Startled by Cuihua's sudden words, makes a sound) Let's follow them for now. I have a feeling they're up to something destructive in the forest; let's see if we can stop them beforehand. If we can't keep up with them, we'll return halfway.

(Startled by Cuihua's sudden words, makes a sound) I'm not sure what he means either. It seems dangerous. To find out the truth about Bald Strong and Fat Bo's deaths and Tutt's disappearance, let's not take this risk. There's always another time.

(Startled by Cuihua's sudden words, makes a sound) It seems like they're planning to cause trouble in the forest. Bald Strong is gone, and more of them come along. Humans are really despicable. Tutt's disappearance must be related to them. Let's chase them away.

(Startled by Cuihua's sudden words, makes a sound) We should head back and tell what we just saw and heard to Jiji and the others. Maybe they have some new ideas. You go ahead first. I'll check if there's anything new, then leave.

question: #question# How should Bear Sneaks express his strong teamwork skills?

content.content: (Startled by Cuihua's sudden words, makes a sound) You're just a burden here too. Why don't you go back first and join up with Jiji and the others? I'll stay here and keep an eye on them.

(Startled by Cuihua's sudden words, makes a sound) Let's go. From what they said, it sounds like they're up to no good in the forest. Let's just run for our lives and forget about Jiji and the rest. Let them solve it themselves.

(Startled by Cuihua's sudden words, makes a sound) Who cares what they mean? If it comes to it, we'll just give them a good beating. I'm great at fighting. With me here, don't worry; I can protect you and everyone in the forest!

dialog.content: You're right, we need to investigate this thoroughly. Let's go.
(grabs Cuihua) Wait, let's follow them once most of them have left, so we won't be found out.
(Cuihua nods) Mm-hmm.
(Xiong Da sees that most of the people have left and gets ready to pull Cuihua along) Let's go, let's go.

Just as they turned to leave, a person in white suddenly turned back and spotted them, immediately shouting out. Xiong Da cursed under his breath as the other people in white converged on the place where they were hiding. Xiong Da and Cuihua hurriedly fled, but during their escape, they slipped and fell off a cliff.
(Cuihua nods) Alright, I'll go meet up with them first.

(After seeing Boss Li and the others leave, Bear Big decides to head back. As he approaches the bear cave, he sees Boing Boing proudly coming out with a radio in his arms) Isn't that Bald Strong's thing? How did it end up with you?
(Glancing at Bear Big, he hums a tune as he walks by) La la la la la.

Bear Big feels puzzled. He walks into the cave and finds Bear Two sitting on the ground with a worried look, and there's a bag of snacks next to him. Bear Big asks) What's wrong with you? And where did the snacks come from?
Boing Boing found them at the edge of the forest.
After Bear Two finished speaking, he stayed silent. Not long after
(Cuihua blocks their car directly) Big Monkey and Er Gou, what are you doing in the forest? Are you here to cause trouble again? Speak the truth.
(Big Monkey and Er Gou are first startled but then exchange knowing smiles) Oh, yes, I’m here to cause trouble. What can you do about it?
(Seeing their arrogant demeanor, he punches the car) Get out of here! Are you the ones responsible for Bald Qiang's death?
(Gives them a mysterious look) Does it matter? Sooner or later, everything will return to normal anyway.

(Feeling confused by his words and about to ask more questions, he looks up to see they’re surrounded by people in white. Xiong Da and Xiong Er jump into the car and quickly drive away. A tranquilizer dart hits the car but is stopped outside. They drive all the way to the little river in the west. Strangely, they don't see Jiji. After running for so long, they are exhausted and thirsty) Cuihua, let's have some water.

After speaking, Xiong Da cupped some river water to drink, and Cuihua took a sip as well. They rested for a while and just as they were about to leave to join the other animals, Xiong Da suddenly felt dizzy and slowly lost consciousness.
(After hearing Bear Big's firm promise, Bongbong nodded decisively) Alright! Please be careful.
(Patting Bongbong on the shoulder) Don't worry, I'll do my best. Remember not to spread this around, or it might cause panic.
(With a serious expression) I understand!

(Bear Big thought that since everything was connected to the cabin fire, maybe more clues could be found there. He reassured Bongbong and went with him to the cabin, now in ruins. Bear Big searched from morning till evening, turning over practically the whole yard but found nothing. The warehouse showed no signs, being very clean and tidy. Bear Big sighed, deciding to return to the bear cave to think things over, when he tripped over a half-burnt beam near the earthen bed) Ouch, just my luck!
What happened? Are you alright?
I'm fine, I'm fine, just tripped on the beam. (Glancing his eyes) How come there are Bear Two's handprints here?
How could your brother's handprints be here!!! Your brother wouldn't...?

(After careful examination, he found some tufts of brown hair near the handprints, and remembered that when they were searching for Bald Head Strong last time, Bear Two wasn't responsible for this area. Recalling the day before the fire, when Bear Two was tricked by Bald Head Strong while stopping him from cutting trees, and afterward, Bear Two said he would make Bald Head Strong pay. Bear Big shuddered, looking grim) There's Bear Two's hair here as well. He wasn't supposed to be searching for Bald Head Strong in this area.
Then let's hurry back and ask your brother for an explanation.

content.content: (Looking troubled) Ask for the truth now? No, no. Even if we find out the truth, what am I supposed to do next? How do I face him in the future? How are we supposed to get along? I need to think this through carefully.

question: #question# How can Bear Big demonstrate his ability to regulate impulses in the face of unexpected events?

content.content: (Looking troubled) If Bear Two even dared to kill Bald Head Strong, I hope he doesn't kill me too. Give me a knife, I'll take it along for self-defense.
(Looking troubled, heartbroken) How did Bear Two become like this? I let down Mom's expectations. Mom, I'm sorry, I didn't take good care of Bear Two. (Starts crying loudly)
(At a loss) What should I do? What should I do? How can it be Bear Two? How can it be Bear Two? Can someone help me, I feel so helpless!

(The two hurried back and found Bear Two) Bear Two, is Bald Head Strong's death related to you? I know you hate Bald Head Strong, I hate him too. Even if it was you, as your brother, I will definitely stand by you. I believe you must be scared to keep it all inside, just tell me the truth, I'm willing to bear the burden with you.

(The two hurried back and found Bear Two, picking up a knife, slowly walking toward Bear Two) Don't worry, brother's knife is fast, no pain. I can't bear to watch you become a murderer, we'll go down to accompany Mom together.

(The two hurried back and found Bear Two, with a calm face) I know you killed Bald Head Strong, I've already called the human police. You staying in the forest would be a threat, hurry up and run away.

(The two hurried back and found Bear Two) Bear Two, once I found your paw print at Bald Head Strong's scene, I understood everything. Killing Bald Head Strong could be considered revenge. What about Fei Bo? When you killed Fei Bo, you became a real demon. I will rid the world of you, this demon.

question: #question# How can Bear Big earn Bear Two's trust and demonstrate strong empathy skills?

content.content: (The two hurried back and found Bear Two, Bear Big was very angry) Tell me! Did you kill Bald Head Strong? I never thought you could be so ruthless. Even if Bald Head Strong did many bad things, and you hated him, there was no need to go to the extent of killing, right? After all, we're all friends in the same forest.

(The two hurried back and found Bear Two, Bear Big was very disappointed) Bear Two, you're really my good brother, even capable of murder. Should I praise you? Tell me the truth, was it you who killed Bald Head Strong and Fei Bo? I'll take you to the police station to surrender, seeking leniency. What do you think?

(The two hurried back and found Bear Two) Boo hoo hoo, Bear Two, now that you've killed Bald Head Strong, don't kill me too. I know you hate everyone you don't like, but I can hardly believe it was my dear brother who did such a thing. Why, I hate myself so much, now my dear brother has to go to jail.

dialog.content: (When Bear Da snapped back to reality, he saw Cuihua looking at him with concern) Bear Da, what’s wrong? Why have you been so distracted lately?

(Responding to Bear Da’s concern, Bear Da shook his head and took a step back, accidentally bumping into the dining table behind him. The food Cuihua had prepared fell to the floor, and Bear Er, who hadn’t eaten yet, complained repeatedly) Hey, Bear Da, what are you doing?
(Bear Da ignored her, leaving Cuihua puzzled) Are you okay? You can talk to us about anything.
(No matter how he was questioned, Bear Da just shook his head) It’s nothing, sorry, you guys go ahead and eat.

After that, the animals in the forest noticed that Bear Da seemed like a different person, always distracted. Cuihua asked multiple times but never got any answers. A few days later, under the cliff at dusk on the western mountain, Carrot Top discovered Bear Da’s body. No one knew how he fell. Considering Bear Da’s recent state of mind, the animals thought he must have been so absent-minded while walking that he didn’t notice the cliff edge. Jiji and the others decided to organize an educational event in the forest about walking correctly.
(Bear Two is stunned by what Bear One said) What are you talking about?
(looking at Bear Two with a pained expression) I went to the cabin again today, and I found your claw marks and some of your fur there. But I've taken care of everything.
(his eyes gradually redden, and he lowers his head) Bear One, I didn't mean to.
(steps forward and embraces Bear Two tightly) Remember, you’ll always be my brother. I’ll always stand by your side.

(as if a floodgate has opened, begins to cry loudly) Bear One, I really didn’t mean it, I never thought this would happen. I only wanted to teach Bald Strong a lesson, I didn’t think he would end up dead.

Bear One comforted Bear Two for a long time, and Bear Two explained how Bald Strong really died. They agreed never to speak of it again and returned to their cave together. Although Bald Strong's death cast a shadow over the forest, after some time, everyone went back to life as it was before.
(angry) We don't need to build a grave for a lumberjack who destroyed the forest.
Jiji, Bald Strong is dead now. Think about it, he wasn't all that bad at heart.
Yeah, boss, although Bald Strong often cut down trees, he was sometimes pretty nice to us. And now he died so miserably.
(shakes head and sighs, as the animals think of past events, they all feel a bit sad) You're right, let's bury him in the Beauty Pine Forest.

(lying in bed at midnight, but can't fall asleep? Feels like something was forgotten. Suddenly, Bear One sits up rapidly) Where did Feibo go? With this thought, Bear One rushes to the cabin and on the way, meets Mao Mao) Mao Mao, I suddenly realized that Feibo is missing!
Yeah, I didn't notice until you mentioned it. But I just passed by Cuihua's tree hole, and the light inside was on. Do you want to check it out?

content.content: Ah! It's so late and she's still awake. She must be upset about Bald Strong's death today. She's never experienced something like this, she must be both sad and scared. I should go check on her. (opens Cuihua's door)

question: #question#How should Bear One speak so others feel his words are warm and easy to resonate with?

content.content: Why is she not asleep at this late hour? Doesn't she care about beauty anymore? Aren't girls supposed to love beauty sleep? It's too unhealthy, I should go and make sure she takes care of herself. (opens Cuihua's door)
(smug, with a warm smile) Cuihua is still awake this late, could she be waiting for me? Hehehe. Maybe I should just go in and see, it might really be the case. (opens Cuihua's door)
(worried, frowning) Why is the light on so late, let's hope nothing catches fire. We've just lost Bald Strong, losing Cuihua would be too much, I better check it out. (opens Cuihua's door)
Even though I'm worried about Cuihua, it's so late, is it really appropriate to visit her? If Bear Two finds out, it'll be hard to explain.

question: #question#How should Bear One think to demonstrate his strong belief in ethical conduct?

content.content: Never mind, finding Feibo is more urgent now, let's go.
Cuihua must also be upset in her tree hole, I shouldn't disturb her. It's better to give her some privacy, she certainly wouldn't want anyone to see her crying.
Could Cuihua be dissatisfied with today's welcome party? It would be awkward if I went now; I wouldn't know how to comfort her anyway. Maybe I should find Feibo first.

dialog.content: Recalling all the experiences we had with Bald Qiang, I feel so upset.
(Standing by, at a loss, not knowing how to comfort) Death is irreversible, please accept my condolences!
(Suddenly falls into Bear Da's arms and cries, after calming down) Bear Da, actually, I like you.

(He froze, told Cuihua that before his mother passed away, entrusted him with taking care of Bear Er, not to let her be sad, sorry. Gently extracts himself and leaves, walking outside the cave, faintly smells a scent of honey in the air, but has no mood to care about it now. The next morning, Bear Da wakes up under a tree, having spent the night there, feels a bit calmer, hastily eats some fruits, and starts thinking he didn't check the window yesterday. Looking there first, the warehouse was quite tidy with nothing suspicious. Almost all the places in the ruins have been searched without any findings. Just as he was about to leave, Bear Da’s gaze landed on the fridge next to him. Opening it, it was empty, but some marks on the door caught his attention; examining closely, he confirmed it was Bear Er's handprint. Bear Da couldn't understand why there'd be Bear Er's handprint on the fridge, but then he also discovered a mark on the edge of the heated bed, with some brown fur nearby as well) Could it be that Bear Er started the fire? What should I do?

content.content: (Chooses to investigate secretly. After thinking for a while, decides to ask Radish Head for help since he only cares about carrots and won’t leak any information even if he discovers something. So, he went to Radish Head and told him what he found) I think asking Bear Er directly could harm our relationship if he didn’t do it, but my movements are too noticeable and not good for trailing investigations. Thinking back, only you are skillful enough in the forest to climb trees and move around stealthily, so I want you to follow Bear Er secretly.

question: #question# How should Bear Da express his meticulous thinking in investigating the culprit?

content.content: (Chooses to investigate secretly. After thinking for a while, decides to ask Radish Head for help since he only cares about carrots and won’t leak any information even if he discovers something. So, he went to Radish Head and told him what he found) Radish Head, I believe Bear Er didn’t do this because he’s my own brother, I know him well, and he really likes Cuihua. He wouldn’t want to make her sad. Don’t you think my analysis is meticulous and logically sound?

(Chooses to investigate secretly. After thinking for a while, decides to ask Radish Head for help since he only cares about carrots and won’t leak any information even if he discovers something. So, he went to Radish Head and told him what he found) Radish Head, I actually wanted to investigate on my own, but as you know, my health isn’t very good and I’m a bit afraid. I don't want to collapse from exhaustion without finding the perpetrator. Your mind is so sharp, so I’d like your help.

(Chooses to investigate secretly. After thinking for a while, decides to ask Radish Head for help since he only cares about carrots and won’t leak any information even if he discovers something. So, he went to Radish Head and told him what he found) Radish Head, I want you to follow Bear Er so I can spend more time with Cuihua to prevent her from worrying about me. I like her a lot and don’t want to see her worried because of me. Do you think this is okay?

(Finds Bear Er) Why did you burn the cabin? I've already found evidence. Although Bald Qiang cutting trees was wrong, I know you hate him, and I hate him too, but he didn’t deserve to die. When you did this, did you think about Cuihua?

(Finds Bear Er) Why did you burn the cabin? I've already found evidence. Although Bald Qiang cutting trees was wrong, I know you hate him, and I hate him too, but he didn’t deserve to die. You should run away, just as if nothing happened.
(Looks troubled) There must be other animals that have been here. I need to search carefully again. Bear Er should have been here searching too. We can definitely find more clues.
(Goes back to get a fruit knife, finds Bear Er) Bear Er, admit it, you killed Bald Qiang, or I will kill you!

question: #question# How should Bear Da express his strong empathy?

content.content: (Finds Bear Er) Bear Er, I didn't expect you to be so cruel as to kill Bald Qiang. We were brothers; you've greatly disappointed me. How can you face our parents?

(Finds Bear Er) Do you think you're impressive just because you killed Bald Qiang for felling the trees? Are you feeling proud now? Why so heartless? Aren’t you afraid of karma? Cuihua and I won’t talk to you anymore in the future.
(Finds Bear Er) So you’re the one who killed Bald Qiang. I guess you're really pleased with yourself. If I’d known this earlier, I wouldn’t have let Cuihua follow you. I regret it so much now.

dialog.content: Alright, no problem.
I'll leave it to you then, be careful out there!

(At midnight, Carrot Head hears some noise on the ground, so he pokes his head out to check. He sees Bear Two sneaking out of the bear den with a bag on his back. Remembering Bear One's instructions from earlier, he quietly follows behind.) Let's follow and see.

(Bear Two keeps walking further away until he reaches Logger Vick’s grave, where he stops and buries the bag. Then he places a jar of honey and some fruits at the grave.) I just wanted to play a joke on you guys, didn't expect it would lead to a fire. I’m sorry, it was all my fault. From now on, I’ll bring you honey to eat often.

(After Bear Two leaves, Carrot Head digs up the bag and finds that it's actually containing Fat Bo, which scares her into sitting down on the ground. After recovering, she hurriedly buries the bag again, intending to tell Bear One what she saw tonight. But after wrapping up the bag, she changes her mind.) Bear One cares so much about Bear Two, if I use this matter to threaten them, those two brothers will have to listen to me obediently. This way, I won't have to work hard planting carrots anymore and can even use them to teach that arrogant monkey, Jiji, a lesson.

The next afternoon, Carrot Head rushes to the bear den, and Cuihua has just prepared dinner. Bear Two seems to have noticed Carrot Head following him and plans to have one last meal with Cuihua before making a run for it.

(Bear Two watches the fiery clouds for a long time, initially wanting to deny everything. Hearing Bear One discover the evidence, his throat moved; when Bear One mentioned Cuihua, he suddenly sneered.) Are you going to arrest me now? Cuihua?

(After Bear One asked Bear Two to check on Cuihua and then turn himself in. In the bear cave, Cuihua is humming a tune while preparing dinner. Hearing a sound at the door, Cuihua turns her head smiling and says) You're back just in time, the last dish is almost ready. By the way, where's Bear One?
Mom sent a letter saying she misses us, so Bear One went back first and left me to keep you company.
(Cuihua nods hesitantly, turns around, and continues to prepare the last dish) Oh right, I forgot some gifts, wait for me to go back and get them.
(Cuihua finishes speaking and leaves the bear cave without waiting for Bear Two to answer. Bear Two tries to stop her, but when he runs out, she's already gone.) Hey, hold on a second.
The next day, Bear Two, feeling guilty towards Cuihua, confessed in front of all the forest animals that he accidentally killed Bald Strong and accepted the appropriate punishment.

(Xiong Da skirted around the tree hollow and continued walking toward the cabin. Nearby, he came across Tutu, who was rubbing his head, and Xiong Da approached him.) Tutu, what are you doing here? What happened?
(Looking bewildered) I only remember waking up here, but I can't recall anything else.

(Frowning a bit, he led her alongside him. As they reached the cabin, Tutu started to tremble non-stop. Xiong Da thought he might have been affected by the sight and comforted him while continuing toward the warehouse.) Come with me to the cabin. I want to find Feibo. Don't be afraid; I'm here.
(Still with a frightened expression, speaking in a trembling voice) Okay, I'll go with you.

(At the warehouse entrance, Xiong Da picked up a smooth and shiny pine cone, which was quite beautiful. While speaking, he put it away, intending to give it as a gift to Bengbeng later. Inside the chaotic warehouse, apart from encountering some tools and a whiff of fresh air, they found nothing. Exiting the warehouse, Xiong Da noticed a fridge among the ruins gleaming in the moonlight. Inside, he discovered the lifeless Feibo, leaving him perplexed.) There’s no food inside, so why did Feibo enter? And how did he get trapped?
(Just as Xiong Da was puzzled beyond belief, Tutu whispered a reminder in his ear.) It seems like someone is nearby.
(Swallowing nervously, shouting) Who's there?

(From a distant bush, some movement was noticeable, and Xiong Er's figure appeared before the two.) It's me, Xiong Da. I woke up hungry and went to find something to eat. I noticed you weren’t around and came to look for you. Have you found anything?

content.content: (While checking the body, Xiong Da voiced his doubts to Xiong Er. Turning around, he noticed Xiong Er was hugging the fridge looking for food, so he quickly pulled him aside.) I have a new idea. I suspect Bald Qiang and Feibo’s deaths were not accidents. You say there’s clearly no food in the fridge? Why did Feibo go in, and how did he end up trapped? If I were Feibo, I wouldn’t randomly go into a fridge.

question: #question# How should Xiong Da express to demonstrate his active creative thinking?

content.content: (While checking the body, Xiong Da voiced his doubts to Xiong Er. Turning around, he noticed Xiong Er was hugging the fridge looking for food, so he quickly pulled him aside.) Poor Feibo, he actually died in a fridge. I wonder what he went through. In his last moments, he must have felt so lonely and cold, with no one by his side.

(While checking the body, Xiong Da voiced his doubts to Xiong Er. Turning around, he noticed Xiong Er was hugging the fridge looking for food, so he quickly pulled him aside.) We found Feibo’s body in the fridge. Stop looking for food here. Do you think Feibo froze to death or suffocated? Doesn’t it strike you as odd?

(Scratching his head) It’s just sad that Bald Qiang and Feibo died one after the other. I think they must have seen or heard something that got them killed. What do you think? Also, Xiong Er, have you made any new discoveries?

(Sensing the complexity of the matter and not wanting to involve Xiong Er, he decided to temporarily keep him in the dark and investigate on his own.) I haven’t found much, just came over to see if there’s anything to discover. Don’t worry about it. Don’t you trust your brother’s abilities? I’ll let you know if I find anything.

question: #question# How should Xiong Da address Xiong Er to reassure him of his abilities?

content.content: (Sensing the complexity of the matter and not wanting to involve Xiong Er, he decided to temporarily keep him in the dark and investigate on his own. He shook his head, hesitant to say anything but fearing Xiong Er might become suspicious.) Don’t worry about it. When you have time, check on Cuihua. She must be very worried and scared right now.

(Sensing the complexity of the matter and not wanting to involve Xiong Er, he decided to temporarily keep him in the dark and investigate on his own.) It’s nothing, really. I just ran into Tutu, and we came over to take a look. You should check other places first.

(Sensing the complexity of the matter and not wanting to involve Xiong Er, he decided to temporarily keep him in the dark and investigate on his own.) You came over all of a sudden and startled me. I was just passing by, taking Tutu home. What brings you here?

dialog.content: (Bear Two scratches his head) It must have been when the fire broke out, Feibo didn't have time to run and had no choice but to hide in the fridge. It turns out the fridge door got blocked, which is why he couldn't get out.

(Tutu nods in agreement from the side. Bear One thinks about it and feels he makes some sense, so he doesn't dwell on it further and decides to bury Feibo next to Bald Qiang.) What you said makes sense. Let's bury Feibo first.

(The next day, Carrot Head plans to ask Tutu for help with finding some quality carrot seeds, but discovers Tutu is missing and is so scared he rushes to find Bear One. On the way, he runs into Jiji.) What are you rushing around for?

(Carrot Head claims he has something to tell Bear One, even though Jiji insists that as king, he has the duty to help his subjects solve problems, but before he finishes, Carrot Head runs straight to the bear's den without turning back.) Bear One, Bear One, Tutu is missing!

question: #question# What should Bear One say to demonstrate his strong sense of collaboration?

content.content: (Bear One decides to immediately gather the animals to search for Tutu. Just as he's about to give the order, Jiji suddenly jumps out and commands everyone to find Tutu immediately, which leaves Bear One a bit helpless.)

(Bear One decides to immediately gather the animals to search for Tutu. Just as he's about to give the order, Jiji suddenly jumps out and commands everyone to find Tutu immediately, which leaves Bear One a bit helpless.)

(Sobbing, with a terrified expression on his face) Wuuu, what should I do? What if something happened to Tutu? I was with him yesterday, and now something's happened to him. Could I be next? I need to find a place to hide quickly. You guys go find Tutu. You distract the bad guys, and I'll hide to protect myself from being caught. Thank you!

Maybe Tutu just happened to step out. Don't worry, I'll go find him right away. Bald Qiang just had an accident and everyone in the forest is on edge, so let's not alarm others to avoid causing panic. I'll go look for Tutu by myself.

question: #question# How can Bear One demonstrate his ability to regulate negative emotions when faced with unexpected events?

content.content: (Looking at Carrot Head with disdain) Stop making a fuss, he's just not home. Bald Qiang just had an accident and everyone in the forest is jittery, so let's not disturb others. I'll go look for him. You're so tiny that you'd just be a burden, so I'll go find Tutu by myself.

(Impatient) What kind of trouble could Tutu be in? You're just being hysterical. Forget it, forget it, don't worry or you'll make everyone in the forest more anxious. I'll just go look for him. I'm strong and fit, and the situation in the forest is complicated, so I'll go on my own. You don't need to come along or you'll distract me.

(Looking panicked) How could he disappear? I'm really anxious right now, let's go find him together. The forest feels eerie and it's making everyone nervous. Let's unite and find him first, so we can look out for each other.

dialog.content: Bear One is right, we'll find Tutu faster if we all look together.
Yes, let's hurry and look for Tutu, time is of the essence.
Listen to your king! I command everyone to search for Tutu at once, no disobedience allowed.

(Everyone originally had panicked expressions, but hearing Jiji's words, they all looked at him speechlessly, then turned around to search for Tutu. Maomao, however, wore a face of admiration) Long live the king! Long live the king!
The animals searched the forest all day, but didn't find a single feather of Tutu's. By evening, Bear One was exhausted.
(After thinking for a moment, feeling that Bear's opinion is right, leaves after speaking) Alright, be careful with everything, Big Bear.

(But after a whole day without finding even a feather of Tutu, Big Bear gradually felt that things were not that simple, so he had to return to the bear's den) Sigh, I've been searching all day, how come I found nothing?
(Looking at Big Bear with confusion) Big Bear, what are you talking about? What did you find or not find?
(Thinking that it can't be told to Little Bear) Nothing much, Raddish Head told me there's something going on tomorrow, so I have to go out for a bit.
Oh, alright.

(The next day, Big Bear continues to search for traces of Tutu in the forest, only to discover a car inside the apples, and getting out of the car were Da Ma Hou and Er Gou, with a group of people in white clothes not far away, doing something unknown? Thinking of the previous Dudu incident) These two appearing in the forest is definitely not a good thing. What are so many people doing here? Should I follow and have a look?

(Big Bear feels that it's better not to act rashly and to observe in secret) With so many of them in the forest, they're definitely up to no good. If I rashly reveal myself, I’m sure to alert them. It's too late to call for help now, so I’d better secretly follow them to see what exactly they're plotting.

(Da Ma Hou and Er Gou are standing respectfully by the car window, talking to the person inside. Big Bear takes a closer look and finds that the person in the car is Boss Li) All the orchards and rivers in the forest will be released, ensuring nothing goes wrong. And this time, Genius Wei has delayed the effective time by a month, the animals will forget about it unknowingly, so there'll absolutely be no issues. To avoid unexpected troubles, those few important ones will be secretly captured tonight. So far, a few have already been killed: Bald-Headed Strong, Fat Wave, and Tutu.
Are you sure they're all dead?
Rest assured, they're all dead, and the bodies have already been sent to Genius Wei's lab.
Okay, take me to the cabin to have a look.

Seeing Da Ma Hou and Er Gou repeatedly agreeing, Big Bear couldn't make sense of the conversation. Big Bear decided to go to the cabin to see what they were really up to. But when leaving, he accidentally stepped on a can, quickly fled, and unfortunately slipped and fell off a cliff on the way.
I thought you guys had discovered something. Of course I believe you! Bear 1, you're the best.

(Bear 1 was about to check the fridge again but noticed Bear 2 hugging it, looking for food. Bear 1 hurriedly pulled him away, but aside from Bear 2's pawprints, there was nothing else.) Hey! What time is it now? How can you still be thinking about food? Don't disturb the scene!
(scratching his head) I didn't mean to, I'm just a bit hungry.
(smiles helplessly) Still, you can't be looking for food here. Oh, let's just leave it.
(In resignation, they had to bury Feibo, looking at Bald Qiang and Feibo's gravestone.) Bear 1, what do we do next?

content.content: You just got back from being unconscious, your mind isn't clear right now, and you're physically weak. Besides, it's so late, it's not safe for you to be alone. Let Bear 2 and me take you home. We're unstoppable in the forest.

question: #question# How should Bear 1 speak to make Toot Toot feel cared for?

content.content: Let Bear 2 and me take you back first. Don't forget, you just woke up. What if you pass out again with your cloudy mind? Let's go, we'll take you back and make sure no bad guys target you.

I see you're still not quite awake. It's pitch dark; who knows, there might be ghosts! Let us take you home first. We'd have to be distracted taking care of you here, slowing down our progress. We'd be more at ease with you at home.
There's no use for you to stay here, better go back and rest first. Leave the rest to us. Trust Bear 2 and me; we'll definitely solve it and find clues. Don't worry, go back and get some rest.

Toot Toot, I've thought carefully, through the investigation just now, it seems someone has been here at the cabin. So I need you to hide in the tree at the cabin and keep watch to see who comes by, so we can plan our next step.

question: #question# How should Bear 1 phrase it to convince Toot Toot of his idea?

content.content: Toot Toot, I don't think you're much capable. Tagging along with me won't help, so why don't you stay here and keep Feibo company? Otherwise, Feibo would be lonely going off on his own.

How would I know? The situation is so complex, I can't think straight. But I think we need to rest first, find something to eat, and replenish our strength. You see, Bear 2 is so hungry; with a good rest, we can think of a good way.

Toot Toot, I'm actually feeling very down. Coming to the cabin today started making me upset again. How about we just stay here with Feibo for now? Don't let Feibo go off alone, and then we can plan long-term. How about that?

dialog.content: (The next day, Tutu was found dead in his tree hole by Bunbun, who quickly ran to the bear cave) Yo Big Bear! Big Bear! We've got trouble. I just found Tutu dead.
(In disbelief and follows Bunbun outside) What are you saying? Where did you find him? I saw him just last night.
(Breathlessly as they run) Right in his own tree hole. I wanted to go find some food with him today, so I went to look for him, and that's when I found his body there.

(Rushes to the scene quickly, checks and finds no wounds on Tutu's body; apart from some fruit cores, there are no other traces. Big Bear furrows his brows, thinking it's a conspiracy against the forest, especially with Bald Strong and Fat Bo already gone, and now Tutu; he's certain the forest has an intruder.) No suspicious traces here? Did you notice anything when you got here?
(Narrowing eyes, thinking for a while) I didn't notice anything. It was just like this when I came this morning. What should we do?

content.content: : Don't worry for now. If we say anything, it'll just cause unnecessary panic. Trust me, I'll get to the bottom of this. I'm the most capable bear in this forest (feeling insecure internally).

question: #question# How should Big Bear speak to convey optimism and alleviate Bunbun's fear?

content.content: (Looking stunned) Hahaha, to be honest, I don't know either. I'm confused too about what's going on in the forest lately. But don't worry, I'll protect you!
Hey, let me think this through, hehe, it's not a big deal. But for now, let's not spread the news. After all, it's not good news either.
First of all, we should temporarily keep this news to ourselves. Why don't we sneak away quietly now? You seem pretty scared. Anyway, I'm very strong, I'm not afraid of anyone (very confident).

: (Big Bear held a forest meeting to announce Tutu's death) I have some unfortunate news, Tutu has also died in his home. I believe there might be intruders in the forest. I'm worried they might strike again. I am fully dedicating myself to finding the culprit, so I might not be able to attend to everyone. I'm telling you so everyone can be prepared; go out in pairs. Together, we can get through this.

question: #question# How should Big Bear speak to demonstrate effective work ethic and boost everyone's morale?

content.content: (Big Bear held a forest meeting to announce Tutu's death) Tutu is gone. I know it's hard for everyone. I hope you all stay strong. Though he's gone, we must cherish life. Go out more, spend time with family and friends, enjoy the beautiful life. Life in the forest is wonderful, I'm sure everyone's life here is full of joy!

(Big Bear held a forest meeting to announce Tutu's death) I have some unfortunate news, Tutu has also died in his home. I'm sorry his death is partly my fault; I knew something might happen but I didn't stay with him at home yesterday. I shouldn't have left. I know I'm responsible for this. I apologize to everyone, and promise to protect everyone more vigilantly in the future!

(Big Bear held a forest meeting to announce Tutu's death) I have some unfortunate news; Tutu has also died in his home. Bear Two and I took him home yesterday, will I be next? Boohoo, everyone, please protect me, I'm very scared right now. This forest is becoming scarier. Let's band together and protect me, thank you all!

dialog.content: (But after two days without Bear One discovering any valuable clues, he returns to the bear den exhausted. Cuihua and Bear Two have already prepared a meal.) Bear One, what have you been up to these past two days? It seemed like you were investigating something?
Yeah, you look so worn out these days. Is something going on? Don't hold it in, talk to us about it.

(After hearing their concerned words, and reflecting on his own lack of progress, Bear One sighs and says) To be honest, Tutu passed away. I was afraid everyone would panic, so I haven’t told anyone these past few days. I’ve been looking into it.
(Cuihua listens in disbelief, murmuring) How could this happen? How could Tutu...? It feels like someone did this on purpose.
I also think it was someone’s deliberate act. That's why I want to quickly find the culprit and restore peace to the forest.

(Bear Two's face shows a flash of panic upon hearing the news of Tutu's death, then he listens intently to the others, with shadows playing across his face as the light shifts.) This matter requires careful planning. Let's eat first, and after we finish, we can discuss what to do next.

The next day, Bumpkin goes to the bear den to ask Bear One how the investigation is going. He calls out for a long time with no response, and upon entering the den, finds all three inside—Bear One, Bear Two, and Cuihua—dead.
(Just as Bear Da finished speaking, Jiji ran up and grabbed the microphone) I, your king, will lead all citizens to resist the invaders.

(All the animals were extremely frightened and fled to other forests. In less than a day, only Bear Da, Bear Er, Jiji, Maomao, Bouncing, Cuihua, and Carrothead were left in the whole forest, and nightfall came) To avoid any incidents, let's all stay together in the bear cave for now.
(Everyone followed Bear Da to the bear cave, and Cuihua also prepared a sumptuous dinner. After dinner) Staying with you all is beneath my status, I better go back.

(The animals spent a long, anxious night. Seeing everyone so worried, they hurriedly had breakfast, then led the remaining few to set up traps around the forest) We cannot sit idly by; let's go set up some traps around the forest first.
Okay, we need to take the initiative, let's follow Bear Da's lead.

(They set up traps in the forest. While passing through the apple orchard, Bear Da noticed a car parked on the roadside, and standing next to it were Big Horse Monkey and Er Gou. In the distance, there was a group of people in white clothes doing something under the apple trees, and they had unknown objects in their hands. Recalling the recent Dudu incident, Bear Da became even more suspicious of these humans' intentions) I have no idea what these humans are up to, but they definitely mean no good (the voice was loud, causing a noise).

content.content: : (walks over directly) Big Horse Monkey, why are you here? Are you involved in the recent events in the forest? What are those people in white doing in the apple orchard?

question: #question# How can Bear Da initiate a positive conversation with Big Horse Monkey?

content.content: (walks over directly, staring at them angrily without saying a word)

(walks over directly) What are you looking at? Never seen such a handsome bear before! We have nothing to say to each other, you better leave the forest quickly. Otherwise, don't blame me for being rude! (clenches fists, flexing muscles)
(walks over directly) The forest is not peaceful lately, and I don't even want to know why you are here, but for your own safety, I advise you to leave as soon as possible.
: I'm so annoyed by these people, but we're outnumbered, so for now, let's hold our ground and observe their real intentions.

question: #question# How should Bear Da express that he's consciously controlling his anger?

content.content: These people are so nasty and powerful, and someone as formidable as Bear Da can only temporarily avoid them with bare hands. Once I find a suitable stick, let's drive them out.
So many people coming to the forest, other animals must be terrified. I better save my energy, find a good weapon, and later give them a real fight, showing them who's the boss here.
These people make me so angry. First, Bald Qiang died, and now more humans show up. Humans are really annoying, we must teach them a lesson.

dialog.content: (Big Horse Monkey and Er Gou paused for a moment, then burst into laughter) Hahahaha, how funny, a prey coming to us on its own!
What are you laughing at? Hurry up and tell me why you're here in the forest, or I'll show you what I'm made of.
(laughing so hard he can hardly stand straight, with a sinister look in his eyes) Hahahahaha, do you want to see who’s surrounding you? Since you're so eager to die, let me help you along!

(After listening to him, Bear Da immediately sensed danger and looked up. All those people in white were aiming at him, each holding a tranquilizer gun. He slowly backed away) Just kidding, you guys carry on, I won’t disturb you anymore.

After saying this, Bear Da turned and ran forward, only to hear the sound of something breaking through the air behind him. Several tranquilizer darts flew toward him, leaving him nowhere to hide, and he slowly lost consciousness.
(Just when Bear Big was intently peeking, Radish Head, who had been digging a trap underground, dug right under his feet) Hey, Bear Big, what are you doing here?
(Bear Big, startled by the noise, quickly tries to stop him) Shh! Keep it down!
(Radish Head quickly went quiet, seeing Bear Big's serious expression, and looked in the direction he was pointing) What are Big Monkey and Er Gou doing here? Who are these people?
I have no idea, but it can't be anything good.

(Just as they were focused on watching, the hole that Radish Head had dug suddenly collapsed. Completely unprepared, Bear Big and Radish Head fell hard into the hole. Hearing the noise twice in succession, Big Monkey and Er Gou hurriedly brought the people in white clothes closer to where they were) Who’s there?

Bear Big and Radish Head hurriedly tried to get up and run away, but Bear Big's leg was stuck in the hole. Despite their efforts to pull it out, they couldn't move. A group of people slowly surrounded them, and when the two looked up, they saw Big Monkey and Er Gou, each holding a tranquilizer gun aimed at them. Bear Big and Radish Head gradually lost consciousness.
(A day later, Tutu reports to Bear Big and then lowers his head) Only Bear Two, Bouncy, and Gigi have been to the cabin, but it's unclear what they did there.
(Bear Big finds it strange) What's wrong?
(Tutu speaks as if mustering all his courage) The cabin caught fire. I was at the scene that night, but I accidentally bumped into a tree. When I woke up, all I remember is a shadow chasing me.

(Bear Big, after hearing this, finds it even more unusual) Find a safe place to hide. I’ll call the three of them to the cabin to see if we can get any information out of them. But, without any evidence, there’s no way they'll admit to anything. Let’s give it a try.

(When Bear Big arrives at the cabin, Bear Two, Bouncy, and Gigi, along with Maomao, are already waiting at the door. As soon as Bear Big appears, Gigi loudly rebukes) Why did you bring me to this place?
(Bear Big smiles without answering, noticing that Gigi hasn’t carried his usual staff lately, and asks) Gigi, where is your staff?
(Gigi replies impatiently) Why are you asking? I lost it!

Bear Big nods, just about to ask about last night, when three humans suddenly appear nearby. Bear Big finds it odd; apart from Logger Strong, humans are almost never seen in the forest. Why are these people here now? Could they be connected to the cabin fire?

content.content: (Walking towards them) Hello there, I’m Bear Big, living in the forest. I’d like to ask what brings you to the forest. Besides the loggers, people hardly come here, and there’s not much to see in the forest at this time of year. Is there something specific you’re here for?

question: #question#How can Bear Big initiate a positive dialogue interaction and demonstrate his meticulous thinking?

content.content: (Walking towards them) You there, stop! Tell me what you humans are doing in the forest. Are you connected to the recent events here? The way you're sneaking around, you can't be up to any good. Did you harm Logger Strong? Is the weapon you used on you? Hand it over quickly!

(Walking towards them) Hey, who are you guys?! Do you know there's been a lot of trouble in the forest lately? Aren't you afraid of losing your lives coming here now? Maybe you need a little lesson to leave. Get going or else!

(Walking towards them) Hey, I’m begging you, please leave. It's become unbearable to stay in the forest lately; there have been many unexplained deaths. If something happens to you, don't blame me for not warning you. I advise you to leave quickly.
Bear Two, Gigi, Maomao, let's not worry about them for now. I have some questions for you first. Afterward, you all go somewhere safe, and I'll investigate these people myself.

question: #question#How can Bear Big efficiently complete his task?

content.content: I really don't want to get involved in human affairs. Let's just let them fight among themselves. Bear Two, Gigi, Maomao, let's quickly go somewhere safe and not let them find us.
Bear Two, Gigi, Maomao, the forest hasn't been peaceful recently. If they dare to do bad things in the forest, we won't let them leave unscathed. They've been bothering us in the forest too much.
Bear Two, Gigi, Maomao, should we warn them that the forest hasn't been peaceful lately? Tell them to hurry up and leave the forest before anything happens.

dialog.content: We signed up for the Bald Strong's Farmhouse in the past few days to visit the forest.

(Bear Big thought for a moment. Indeed, some time ago Bald Strong had organized a farmhouse event, and it seemed like these three people were the ones who attended. Judging by their appearance, they seemed unaware that Bald Strong had already passed away.) Is that so? Then you'd better leave as soon as possible; something has happened in the forest recently.

(Just as Bear Big finished telling them to leave, a car drove up to the cabin and stopped in front of the door. Out came Monkey Dama, leaving both sides stunned. Monkey Dama was the first to react, he coughed cautiously with his head lowered) I'm just here accompanying the boss for a visit, we'll be leaving right away.
(After Monkey Dama finished speaking, he jumped back into the car. The tour group of three waved at the car) You folks are back for another round.

content.content: (Seeing a golden cane extend from the car, tapping on the heads of the three, Bear Big realized the person in the car was Boss Li. Bear Big sensed that their purpose in coming to the forest wasn’t simple, yet he could only watch helplessly as the car was about to leave. He said to Maomao and Jiji) Why are both Monkey Dama and Ergou here? I really want to beat them up and kick them out of the forest. But why is Boss Li here too? He rarely visits the forest. He must have a bigger scheme. We'd better stay calm and investigate after they leave.

question: #question#How should Bear Big think to reflect his ability to manage his negative emotions?

content.content: (Seeing a golden cane extend from the car, tapping on the heads of the three, Bear Big realized the person in the car was Boss Li. Bear Big sensed that their purpose in coming to the forest wasn’t simple, yet he could only watch helplessly as the car was about to leave. He said to Maomao and Jiji) These people are outright bad guys. Let's grab some weapons, sticks, stones, to let off some steam and manage our current anger. What do you think?

(Seeing a golden cane extend from the car, tapping on the heads of the three, Bear Big realized the person in the car was Boss Li. Bear Big sensed that their purpose in coming to the forest wasn’t simple, yet he could only watch helplessly as the car was about to leave. He said to Maomao and Jiji) With so many unexpected visitors in the forest recently, I think it's better to set up some traps first. This way, we can protect the remaining animals and give them some sense of security so they don't feel so scared and anxious.

(Seeing a golden cane extend from the car, tapping on the heads of the three, Bear Big realized the person in the car was Boss Li. Bear Big sensed that their purpose in coming to the forest wasn’t simple, yet he could only watch helplessly as the car was about to leave. He said to Maomao and Jiji) Why are Monkey Dama and Boss Li here? We are outnumbered, so we can’t confront them head-on. Let’s investigate them after they leave.

(A golden cane extended from the car, tapping on the heads of the three. The person in the car turned out to be Boss Li. Bear Big sensed that their purpose in coming to the forest wasn’t simple. As the car was about to leave, Bear Big, along with Maomao and Jiji, sneaked into the trunk and said to them) The affairs of the forest must be related to them. It’s dangerous to go, but I’ve already promised the animals in the forest to uncover the truth and stop miscreants from causing trouble here. Wait for my good news.

question: #question#How should Bear Big speak to show his strong sense of responsibility?

content.content: (A golden cane extended from the car, tapping on the heads of the three. The person in the car turned out to be Boss Li. Bear Big sensed that their purpose in coming to the forest wasn’t simple. As the car was about to leave, Bear Big, along with Maomao and Jiji, sneaked into the trunk and said to them) Look, even Boss Li is here. We need to follow them to see what’s really going on.

(A golden cane extended from the car, tapping on the heads of the three. The person in the car turned out to be Boss Li. Bear Big sensed that their purpose in coming to the forest wasn’t simple. As the car was about to leave, Bear Big, along with Maomao and Jiji, sneaked into the trunk and said to them) Although I know it's dangerous to go, with my courage and strength, at worst I'll just beat them up and come back. Don’t worry, I guarantee it.

(A golden cane extended from the car, tapping on the heads of the three. The person in the car turned out to be Boss Li. Bear Big sensed that their purpose in coming to the forest wasn’t simple. As the car was about to leave, Bear Big, along with Maomao and Jiji, sneaked into the trunk and said to them) Follow them! Follow them! It's like bad luck raining down! Why is this getting more complicated? I just want to be a carefree bear, so my parents won't worry, and our family can be happy together!

dialog.content: (With an expression of wonder) Yeah, but that scepter that just extended from the car was so beautiful! It totally suits King Kiki’s status.
(Initially puzzled, then angrily) What scepter? If you know it fits my royal status, why haven’t you brought it back to me yet?
(Hearing Kiki’s words, and seeing the car has already driven away, feels unworthy to serve Kiki) I’m sorry, Your Majesty, the car has already left. I’ll definitely find you an even better scepter.
(Hearing the commotion between the two, not in the mood to think much, just advises) Now’s not the time to worry about a scepter, let's talk about it later.
Shortly after the car left, a group of people dressed in white appeared near the cabin, a few gunshots, Bear One and Bear Two both

(After a bumpy ride, not knowing how much time has passed, the car finally stops. Xiong Da quietly jumps off the car and hides behind the stone lion at the entrance. After Boss Li gets out of the car, he goes straight into the yard. Meanwhile, Da Mahou and Ergou begin to argue at the door with the courtyard entrance right behind them) It's all because you drank. If the boss blames us later, neither you nor I will be able to handle it.
(pushes Ergou angrily) Tch, coward, I have my ways.
Your ways, what ways do you have? The person is dead!
(Xiong Da looks at the two arguing, with the courtyard entrance right behind them) Should we go in?

content.content: Let's go inside. We've come this far; we must find out the truth about the fire in the cabin and the death of Guangtou Qiang and the others. We owe it to the forest to restore peace. We've been unable to solve the mystery in the forest, so we might as well go in and see what their schemes are.
We should go investigate. I'm strong enough that I'm not afraid even if there's danger. I can't guarantee your safety, though. If you're afraid, I can escort you back, and we can come another day.

We've investigated this far and Boss Li has shown up; this thing doesn't seem simple at all. It's tough for the three of us to complete this task. Do you think we should find a place to rest and replenish our energy? I'm really hungry. If we encounter a sudden situation, I'm afraid I won't have the energy to escape. Or we could just go back.

We've been investigating out of desperation; would further investigation be dangerous? Should we just head back the way we came? This is too risky; we might not return. Do you still want to go? If you want to go, I will risk my life to accompany you.

question: #question# How can Xiong Da demonstrate his commitment to his responsibilities in fulfilling his mission?

content.content: We've been investigating out of desperation; would further investigation be dangerous? Should we just head back the way we came? This is too risky; we might not return. Do you still want to go? If you want to go, I will risk my life to accompany you.

We've investigated this far and Boss Li has shown up; this thing doesn't seem simple at all. It's tough for the three of us to complete this task. Do you think we should find a place to rest and replenish our energy? I'm really hungry. If we encounter a sudden situation, I'm afraid I won't have the energy to escape. Or we could just go back.
We should go investigate. I'm strong enough that I'm not afraid even if there's danger. I can't guarantee your safety, though. If you're afraid, I can escort you back, and we can come another day.
(trembling all over) We don't know what's inside the yard. Boss Li is so terrible, if he discovers us, there's no escape. I'm also afraid I can't protect you, so let's just wait at the door.

question: #question# How can Xiong Da show that he has deeply analyzed his inner thoughts and feelings?

content.content: (trembling all over) We don't know what’s inside the courtyard; let's think it over. I’m not scared, just think things over carefully. We must ensure our safety as much as possible, and I'm also afraid I can't protect you, so let's wait at the door.

(trembling all over) Discovering that this incident involves Boss Li is already quite impressive on our part. If anyone's to blame, it's Guangtou Qiang's bad luck, and we can talk about other things later. Let's withdraw for now.

(trembling all over) How does this affair even relate to Boss Li? Knowing this is all tied to him, and considering Guangtou Qiang's poor relationship with him, I'm at a loss on what to decide. What do you think we should do?

dialog.content: (Xiong Da and his group sneak into the courtyard, hiding behind the sofa in the room, waiting for the right moment. Boss Li casually picks up the remote control on the table and presses it, the screen lights up, and a pleasant tune reaches the ears of Xiong Da and his group. Along with the song, Guangtou Qiang, Xiong Da's group, and Xiong Er appear on the screen, followed by their friends in the forest. They can't figure out why they are on the screen.) How did we end up on the screen? Let's listen to what they have to say.
(Big Monkey and Er Gou cautiously enter the room) I just went out with Boss Wang to discuss a deal, how did things escalate to this?
(With a fawning face, glaring angrily at Big Monkey) I'm sorry, Boss Li. It was all because Big Monkey insisted we go drinking that day.
(Big Monkey quickly covers Er Gou's mouth) Don't listen to his nonsense, I have always been meticulous with my work.
(Boss Li slams the table hard) Was it just a lumberjack that died? That was my cash cow. So tell me, would you prefer to feed the crocodiles or the tigers?
(The two of them turn pale with fear, Big Monkey shakes his head repeatedly) Boss Li, please calm down, I have a surprise for you.
A surprise? With someone gone, what kind of surprise could you possibly have left?

(Big Monkey chuckles, takes out a walkie-talkie, says something, then turns off the screen, pulling Er Gou to the side. Soon, the door opens and two people enter the room one after another. Maomao finds one of them very familiar, resembling Guangtou Qiang.) Boss Li, are you satisfied?
What's going on here? How is Guangtou Qiang still alive?
From the beginning of the plan, Boss Wang was worried that something like this might happen, so he had me keep all their genetic information as a backup.
(Boss Li nods, looks again at the person, and smiles slightly) What are you here for?
Boss Li, didn't you ask me to come to get my salary? You're not planning to deny it, are you?

(Laughs heartily) I've always been generous, how could I ever withhold my employees' salaries? This time, not only will you get your pay, but you'll also get a half-year vacation, with Genius Wei personally sending you back to your hometown for a rest.
Thank you, Boss Li!
(As the unknown person leaves the room, Xiong Da sees his face and screams in shock) Maomao, Jiji, why is it Guangtou Qiang? Did they copy Guangtou Qiang's genes?!
This is terrifying, we must hurry back.

The scene shifts, and the forest is as beautiful as ever, the wooden house still standing quietly. The phone rings loudly, Guangtou Qiang answers, Boss Li's angry voice demanding lumber echoes on the other end. Guangtou Qiang looks at the alarm clock on the table pointing at six o'clock, and reluctantly gets up to go log. The scene skims past Tutu, Bongbong, Jiji, Maomao, Xiong Da, Xiong Er, and Luobotou. Maomao holds a microphone and declares, 'I announce the first Jungle Warriors Selection Contest is now underway.' The stories in the forest continue as always. Xiong Da, Maomao, and Jiji know this Guangtou Qiang is a fake, but to avoid causing panic, they keep this secret.

(Da Ma Hou and Er Gou walked into the yard, and the door closed behind them. Xiong Da sighed, bewildered by the surrounding buildings. As he lamented his own cowardice, voices emerged from the yard: 'I'll go underground to get the car, wait for me at the gate.' Just as the words were spoken, the door opened, and the person who came out made Xiong Da shout out loud) Ah? Look, Bald Qiang?!!
(The person who came out was indeed Bald Qiang, he asked in confusion) Xiong Da, what are you doing here?

(Xiong Da turned pale with fright, unsure of the situation. Bald Qiang was supposed to be dead; they had buried him with their own hands. Yet here he stood, alive and well in front of him, making Xiong Da feel like he was dreaming. He could only mechanically mutter) Are you really Bald Qiang?

(At that moment, the person who went to get the car drove over. Xiong Da saw it was Da Ma Hou and Er Gou inside, and the driver was none other than Genius Wei! Big Mao and Er Gou were startled to see Xiong Da talking to Bald Qiang. They quickly got out and shoved Bald Qiang into the car, telling Genius Wei) You take Bald Qiang away first.

The car roared past Xiong Da, who snapped back from his shock at Bald Qiang's resurrection, only to see the gate open again. A few people dashed out, tranquilizer guns in hand, firing at Xiong Da. There was no way for him to outrun the bullets. Pain surged through his body, and he slowly lost consciousness.
(While Xiong Da pulls everyone else to hide and watches the humans walk away) Just going to let them leave like that? They might be here to destroy the forest again.
Exactly, exactly, King Jiji is right.
(Looks at the two without any sign of surprise on their faces) I called you here today to ask what you were doing at the cabin yesterday?
(Listening to Xiong Da, gets very angry) Xiong Da, you actually followed us? A king like me can do whatever I want.
(After Jiji storms off, and Xiong Da can't stop him) Jiji, wait up!
(Xiong Er looks shocked by what Xiong Da said, but quickly hides it) Xiong Da, I walked by there yesterday because I smelled honey.
(Xiong Da nods) Alright, alright, let's head back first.
The next day, Tutu comes to find Xiong Da to inquire about what he investigated yesterday, but is told by Xiong Er that Xiong Da recently went to visit his mother and will not return for a while.
This might not be the best idea. Maybe we should go over and take a look first.
(still looking panicked) I think the fire is quite large; the wooden house is completely ablaze.
(in disbelief) Such a big fire. Maybe we should go and check it out.
Listen to me, the great king. We won't go! It's better if that troublesome Bald Qiang gets into trouble.
Xiong Da and the animals did not go to Bald Qiang's house to check; instead, they continued with the welcome party and did not investigate the cause of the fire.
